price: 74. Mobali moko te kati ya bato to bilima asimba bango,
arabic: لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lam yaṭmith'hunna insun qablahum walā jānnun
